title: cgo can't handle C99 bool type
body:
by **akunokuroneko**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Write cgo stub that includes a header that uses the C99 _Bool type.
2. Run cgo against stub.
3. Watch cgo fail

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
produce usual stubs + compiled object

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOOS=linux
GOARCH=386 / amd64 (happens on both).

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
2f32e74ab96e+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.

This issue has existed since the initial release, but my changes were
rolled up with my fix for opaque objects.

Fix going up in codereview shortly.
